mapper.select: select a.id, a.section_id as sectionId, a.end_at as endAt, a.qualified_score as qualifiedScore, a.created_at as createdAt, a.updated_at as updatedAt, ci.status = 0 as canUpdate from assignment a inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id ::uuid where a.section_id =#{sectionId};
select ci.status = 0 from student_answer a inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id ::uuid where a.id =#{id}::uuid;
mapper.update: update student_score set name = #{name}, end_at = #{endAt}, qualified_score = #{qualifiedScore} where id=#{id}::uuid;
mapper.insert: insert into student_score (section_id, name, end_at, qualified_score) values (#{sectionId}, #{name}, #{endAt}, #{qualifiedScore});
